long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc23 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 23. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc23
golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc22
golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc21

golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.el6

Package golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc23: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=updates-testing golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc23' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-12891/golang-github-jonboulle-clockwork-0-0.3.git3f831b6.fc23 then log in and leave karma (feedback).

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
